channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Homeland Security plans 2,000 officers in Minnesota for its ‘largest immigration operation ever’
item.description: The Department of Homeland Security says it has launched in Minnesota what it’s calling the largest immigration enforcement operation ever carried out by the agency.

item.title: Shooter who killed Brown students and MIT professor planned attack for years, DOJ says
President Trump says his voters loved the Venezuela attack — here’s what they think
